snippet: Thanks to rain, Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams must wait an extra day to start their bids for history at the French Open....
lead_paragraph: Thanks to rain, Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams must wait an extra day to start their bids for history at the French Open.

headline.print_headline: While Djokovic, Williams Wait, Wawrinka Gets Going in Paris
headline.main: While Djokovic, Williams Wait, Wawrinka Gets Going in Paris
